what is the sport in the image

The image features a woman playing tennis on an indoor court. She is in the middle of a serve, holding a yellow and blue tennis ball with her right hand while extending her arm to hit it. Her body position indicates that she is fully engaged in the game. There are two sports balls visible in the scene - one being held by the woman and another located towards the left side of the court. The indoor court provides an ideal environment for practicing tennis, even during unfavorable weather conditions or when outdoor courts are unavailable.

The image features a woman playing volleyball on an indoor court. She is in the middle of serving the ball, holding it with one hand and extending her arm to make contact with the sports ball. The scene takes place on a pink court, which adds a vibrant touch to the setting.

The woman appears focused and determined as she prepares for the serve. In addition to the main player, there are two other people in the background, possibly teammates or opponents waiting for their turn. The presence of multiple individuals suggests that this could be an organized game or practice session.
